page.title: 11YOXALL_HEALTH
page.content: The S.E. Staffs Area Health Authority administers the Health Centre in Savey Lane,which serves 5,500 patients of whom 750 were over 60 years and 150 under 5 years in August 1985.The staff comprises 3 doctors,district nurse, health visitor and 8 part-time receptionists and dispensers.Drugs are dispensed on the premises as there is no local chemist.There is a visiting physiotherapist,chiropodist,midwife and speech therapist.Patients receive special treatment at Burton District Hospital Centre, Burton General Hospital,Yoxall Cottage Hospital or other.Domiciliary midwifery is available but most babies are born in hospital.Most prevalent ailments are musculo-skeletal and respiratory system disorders.Number of deaths per annum is approximately 9 from varied causes.
